basics.name: Branyes Nuñez Abad
basics.label: Full Stack Developer with over 4 years of experience
basics.summary: With over 4 years of experience in the technology sector, I've worked across multiple industries, including Finance, Telecommunications, ERP, and Insurance. I have extensive expertise in Quality Assurance (QA), covering both manual and automated testing with tools such as Selenium, Katalon Studio, Rational Functional Testing, Appium, and PyAutoGUI. Currently, as a Web Developer and Agile Team Lead, I leverage Java Spring Boot, ASP.NET, React.js, PostgreSQL, SQL Server, Python, and Azure Face Recognition, among other tools, to deliver robust and scalable solutions.

work.name: Humano Seguros
work.summary: Advanced to Senior Developer and took on leadership for the development team after contributing significantly to the Kiosk Automation project. Drove quality improvements and feature development, including implementing high-demand services for purchasing car and travel insurance directly through the app. This feature, previously only available on mobile apps, helped elevate the application from sixth to second-highest revenue-generating application in the company. Technologies used include React.js, TypeScript, Java Spring Boot, ASP.NET, PostgreSQL, Python, and Azure Face Recognition.

work.name: Humano Seguros
work.summary: Led automation for the company's innovative self-service kiosk equipped with AI for document and facial recognition. Implemented automation standards, built a comprehensive framework, and created a reporting system to track results. Significantly improved QA processes by introducing automation where none previously existed. Tools used included Java, Selenium, TestNG Reporter Log, and Extent Reports.

work.name: Claro Dominicana
work.summary: Automated critical desktop applications and supervised the API and microservices automation team. Introduced automation practices to the company, established standards, developed guidelines, and created a framework using Java and Selenium to maintain these standards. Implemented a reporting system to visualize automation results.

work.name: Dacodes
work.summary: Applied knowledge gained in JavaScript and Python with Django to develop an application for a school, putting into practice skills acquired at Academlo.

work.name: BHD Bank
work.summary: Led mobile application automation using Appium with Katalon Studio, Java, and Android Studio. Additionally automated desktop applications with Rational Functional Testing using Java and managed the mobile automation team.

work.name: Disoft
work.summary: Managed database maintenance, created backups, generated reports with Crystal Reports and Firebird, and handled all database-related tasks.

work.name: Banco Santa Cruz
work.summary: Served on the collections and customer service team, contacting clients about upcoming loan and credit card payments to ensure timely payments and help avoid late fees. Effectively reduced delinquency rates through proactive outreach while maintaining high customer satisfaction scores.

work.name: Punto Mac
work.summary: Initially served as a Customer Service Representative before promotion to Mac Technician. Responsible for diagnosing and repairing hardware and software issues in MacBook, iMac, and other Apple products. Maintained clear customer communication throughout the repair process.

projects.name: Insurance Kiosk Self-Service Application
projects.description: Led development of a self-service kiosk with AI for document and facial recognition, designed to assist elderly users. Implemented critical features including car and travel insurance purchasing, elevating it to the company's second-highest revenue-generating application.
highlights: Created accessible UI for elderly users

projects.name: Banking Mobile Application Automation Framework
projects.description: Designed and implemented an automation framework for mobile banking applications using Appium, Katalon Studio, and Java.

projects.name: Telecommunications Service Automation
projects.description: Established company-wide automation standards and frameworks for desktop applications in the telecommunications sector.
highlights: First automation implementation in company history
